concept.title: Request-Based Communication
concept.shortdesc: A communication concept where nodes request information from pre-determined other nodes to retrieve information

conbody.note: Nodes need to know which node holds the required information as requests are directed at one node only. If this knowledge is unavailable, Request-For-Broadcast might be the better choice.
conbody.p: Request-based communication requires continuous, recurring polls for information to keep information up-to-date.
Each transaction in communication is a self-contained set of a Request and a Response (or the lack therof). This makes it easy to implement role-based access rights and other security measures.
